sourcesContent:
import React, {useEffect} from 'react'
import axios from "axios";
import {Box, Container, TabsContent, TabsContentGroup, TabsList, Text} from "@chakra-ui/react";

const Homepage = () => {

    return (
        <Container maxW="xl" centerContent>
            <Box
                d="flex"
                justifyContent="center"
                p={3}
                bg="white"
                w="100%"
                m="40px 0 15px 0"
                borderRadius="lg"
                borderWidth="1px"
            >
                <Text fontSize="4xl" fontFamily="Work sans">
                    Chats
                </Text>
            </Box>
            <Box bg="white" w="100%" p={4} borderRadius="lg" borderWidth="1px">
                <Tabs isFitted variant="soft-rounded">
                    <TabList mb="1em">
                        <Tab>Login</Tab>
                        <Tab>Sign Up</Tab>
                    </TabList>
                    <TabPanels>
                        <TabPanel>
                            <Login />
                        </TabPanel>
                        <TabPanel>
                            <Signup />
                        </TabPanel>
                    </TabPanels>
                </Tabs>
            </Box>
        </Container>
    )
}
export default Homepage
